trans-unit.source: Provides schema compilation options for the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> class This class cannot be inherited.
The XmlSchemaCompilationSettings class provides schema compilation options for the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.

For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A> property specifies that the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations when schemas in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> are compiled.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations.
When the EnableUpaCheck property is set to `false`, validation will be performed based on the following rules.
If there is a choice between a strong type and a wildcard, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> will pick the strongly typed particle as illustrated in the following schema and Xml examples.

`<xs:sequence>` `<xs:any namespace="##any"/>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `</xs:sequence>` In the following Xml, the `A` element will be associated with `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` in the schema.
If there is a choice between two strongly typed elements, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> will pick the first one.

`<xs:sequence>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string"/>` `</xs:sequence>` In the following Xml, the `B` element will be associated with `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` in the schema.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
